name: The METAJACKET: RTFKT X Zaid Kirdsey
description: The META JACKET is RTFKT's first jacket. The METAJACKET embodies RTFKT's vision in a new digital skins economy and creative new age in digital Fashion, reskinned by next gen artist Zaid Kirdsey, who creates wonderful worlds and creatures, bringing collectors into his colourful imagination for an unforgettable journey.
